Package com.revs.grill

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.revs.grill.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order in the system.

    • Order

      public Order()
      Default constructor for the Order class.

    • Order

      public Order(int id, int numItems, String orderInfo, Map<Integer,Integer> itemToQuantity, double total, String status)
      Creates a new Order object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order.
      numItems - The number of items in the order.
      orderInfo - Additional information about the order.
      itemToQuantity - A map of item IDs to their quantities in the order.
      total - The total cost of the order.
      status - The status of the order.

      orderInfo - Additional information about the order.
      itemToQuantity - A map of item IDs to their quantities in the order.
      total - The total cost of the order.

    • updateById

      public static boolean updateById(int orderId, String numItems, String orderInfo, String total)
      Updates the order with the specified order ID using the provided information.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to update.
      numItems - The new number of items in the order.
      orderInfo - The new additional information about the order.
      total - The new total cost of the order.
      Returns:
      True if the order was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • removeById

      public static boolean removeById(int orderId)
      Removes the order with the specified order ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the order was successfully removed, false otherwise.
